# Webdock.io Christmas & New Year 2020 promo, 15EUR / ~18USD coupon code for new customers
# 



## XMAS20NEWYEAR21

Apply this coupon to any new customer account at Webdock.io and get a 15 Euro credit. 
 
The coupon is valid from the 15th of December 2020 until January  5th 2021 and can only be applied once you have added a credit card to your account. If left unused, the credit expires June 1st 2021.
 
Webdock.io is headquartered in Denmark and has servers located in Helsinki (Finland) and Dallas (Texas).

Super optimized Perfect Servers with great out-of-the-box LAMP and LEMP stacks available. You get free SSL certificates, lots of free backups, free transactional with Postmark and email forwarding. 

We actively monitor your server and notify you in case of a hack. Great 24/7 customer service. Awesome value for money. Prices are all inclusive, no additional charges or hidden fees. Read more and sign up at https://webdock.io/en
